faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our platform.

q1.q: How quickly can I set up UNMI for my business?
q1.a: Most businesses are operational within 30 minutes. Our setup wizard guides you through connecting WhatsApp Business, configuring SMS, and routing calls.

q2.q: Can I integrate UNMI with my existing phone system?
q2.a: Yes, UNMI integrates with most VoIP systems and traditional phone lines. We support popular providers like Twilio, RingCentral, and many others.

q3.q: What happens if I exceed my message limit?
q3.a: We'll notify you when approaching your limit. You can upgrade your plan or purchase additional credits. We never cut off your service mid-conversation.

templates.title: Templates
templates.subtitle: Create and manage predefined messages for various situations
templates.firstTemplate: Create your first template to start automating responses

form.name: Template Name
form.contentPlaceholder: Hi! We saw you called but we couldn't answer...
form.tip: Include a clear call-to-action and a link to book or contact

actions.deleteWarning: This action cannot be undone. The template will be permanently deleted.

restrictedAccess.title: Restricted Access
restrictedAccess.subtitle: This feature is only available on the Templates plan
restrictedAccess.currentPlan: Your current plan does not include access to template management.
restrictedAccess.upgrade: Upgrade to Templates to create custom WhatsApp and SMS templates.

chatbots.title: Chatbots
chatbots.subtitle: Configure AI chatbots for automated 24/7 responses

howItWorks.title: How does it work?
howItWorks.desc: Select a chatbot provider, configure the API key, and UNMI will automatically route conversations. If the chatbot fails, the Templates system will be used as backup.

preview.title: Chatbot Preview
preview.subtitle: This is how your chatbot will look integrated in conversations
preview.placeholder: Your chatbot interface will be displayed here once configured

fallback.title: Backup System (Fallback)
fallback.subtitle: If the chatbot fails or is unavailable, this system will be used
fallback.conditions: UNMI will automatically use your Templates as backup if:
fallback.condition1: The chatbot doesn't respond within 5 seconds

config.title: Configure
config.subtitle: Connect your account with UNMI
config.apiKeyHelp: Get your API key from the panel. See documentation →
config.webhookHelp: URL where UNMI will send conversations for your chatbot to respond
config.fallbackHelp: Message that will be sent if the chatbot fails completely
config.note: When activating the chatbot, automatic Templates will be paused. They'll only be used as backup in case of error.

form.name: Location Name
form.nameHelp: A descriptive name to identify the location
form.timezoneHelp: Used for scheduling messages and business hours

nextStep.title: Next Step
nextStep.desc: You can now configure phone numbers for each location and start receiving calls. Templates and routing rules can be assigned per location.
